entry.def: If something moves or faces inwards, it moves or faces towards the inside or centre of something.

example.ex: She pressed back against the door until it swung inwards...
example.tran: 她用背顶门，直到门向内打开。

example.ex: Keeping your heels on the ground, turn your feet inwards.
example.tran: 脚跟不要离地,脚向内转。

means.word_mean: 1. to or toward the inside of;
